units.title: Initiate 3D VM organoid differentiation
units.text: To start 3D VM organoid differentiation, RC17, H9, HS999, HS1001, and TH-Cre hPSC cells were detached from the culture dish with 0.5 mM Accutase (Thermo Fisher Scientific, #A1110501) to yield a single cell
units.rationale: Specifies the cell detachment step required to begin organoid formation.

units.title: Plate single cells for differentiation
units.text: Differentiation was initiated by plating 2500 single cells in each well of (Miltenyi, #130-103-456), 400 ng/ml SHH-C24II (Miltenyi, #130-095-727), and a 96-well U-bottom plate (Corning, #CLS7007) in iPS Brew with 10 µM Y-27632 1.5 μM CHIR99021 (Miltenyi, #130-106-539), and in the presence of 200 mM dihydrochloride (Miltenyi, #130-106-538), as previously described27.
units.rationale: Details the seeding density, plate type, and media components for initiating differentiation.

units.title: Transfer organoids to 24-well plate on day 11
units.text: On day 11, developing VM organoids were transferred to a 24-well plate containing 1:50 Neurobasal medium, B27 supplement without vita-
units.rationale: Provides the timing and medium composition for the first medium change.

units.title: Add BDNF and L‑Ascorbic acid on day 14
units.text: On day 14, 20 ng/mL BDNF (Miltenyi, #130-096-286) and 200 µM L-Ascorbic acid (Sigma-Aldrich, #A4403-100MG) were added.
units.rationale: Specifies growth factor supplementation at a defined culture stage.

units.title: Add db‑cAMP and DAPT from day 16 onward
units.text: From day 16 onward, 0.5 mM db-cAMP (Sigma-Aldrich, #D0627-1G) and 1 μM DAPT (R&D Systems, #2634) were added to the culture.
units.rationale: Describes the addition of signaling modulators for later maturation.

units.title: Silk‑scaffold preparation and hPSC integration
units.text: Silk-scaffold preparation and hPSC integration. A 20 µL droplet of Biosilk protein solution (BioLamina, #BS-0101) either alone or functionalized with Lam-
units.rationale: Outlines the creation of the silk scaffold and its functionalization for cell seeding.

units.title: Cell‑viability assay
units.text: Cell viability was measured using the colorimetric CyQuant cell proliferation assay (Invitrogen), following the manufacturer’s instructions. Absorbance was analyzed at 480–520 nm, using 50,000 cells harvested.
units.rationale: Provides the protocol for quantifying cell viability.

units.title: Apoptosis detection by flow cytometry
units.text: Apoptosis was detected via flow cytometry staining using the Alexa Fluor 647 Annexin V conjugate (BD Pharmingen, #A23204) and Click-iT plus TUNEL assay (Invitrogen #C10617) according to manufacturer’s instructions.
units.rationale: Describes the combined staining method for measuring apoptosis.

units.title: Single‑cell RNA‑seq library preparation
units.text: single-cell RNA sequencing, single-cell suspensions were loaded onto 10x Genomics Single Cell 3′ Chips along with the mastermix as per the manufacturer’s protocol and the resulting libraries were sequenced on either a NextSeq500 or a NovaSeq 6000.
units.rationale: Summarizes the workflow for generating and sequencing single‑cell libraries.

units.title: Hypoxia treatment of organoids
units.text: organoids were transferred to the hypoxia chamber (Binder CB160), which was filled with 1% O2 and 5% CO2 and mixed with N2, and collected after 4, 8, and 16 h.
units.rationale: Details the conditions and timing for exposing organoids to hypoxia.
